outputs.output_descr: Identification and approval of 2 aquaculture production plans/sectors; Establishment of 2 production  models in pilot facilities; Capacity development of Shilat technicians for public-private synergy and in rearing new aquaculture species with suitable technoligy and economic approaches; Technical assistance  Technical assistance Market analysis and reduction of business risk; productive plans for private sector; increase of shrimp export; Support of existing and creation of new freshwater farms; Technical assistance Market analysis and reduction of business risk; productive plans for private sector; increase of shrimp export; Support of existing and creation of new freshwater farms.

project_descr: Strengthening and expansion of aquaculture activities in the Sistan-Baluchestan Province for improving the socioeconomic level of target local communities
